comment: This is a page from an ancient Chinese dictionary or character compendium, specifically showing characters from '說文解字第十三' (Shuowen Jiezi, Chapter Thirteen). The layout includes large seal script characters on the left, with their corresponding standard script forms and phonetic annotations (using the '反切' method) to the right. The page number '小一百九十六' (Small 196) appears at the top right, and other marginal notations such as '魏三' are visible. The content is organized in columns, typical of classical Chinese lexicography.
